analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Conditions in Reverse Order, the Chapter on the Conditions in Direct Order, the Chapter on the Conditions in Direct and Reverse Order

original: 21.18. Hetuduka, Vipākattika🔽Nahetuṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nahetuṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paccayā hetu vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu duka vipāka ttika  na hetum na vipākam dhammam paṭicca hetu vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na hetum na vipāka dhamma dhammam paccayā hetu vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Section on the Conditions in Direct Order Beginning with Root-Cause

original: Nahetuṁ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam paṭicca na hetu neva vipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With a non-root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon as condition, a root-causeless resultant phenomenon arises, by root-cause condition … (in brief, as in §1) … With a non-root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon as condition, a root-causeless resultant phenomenon arises, by root-cause condition … (in brief, as in §1) … With a non-root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon as condition, a root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon arises, by root-cause condition … (in brief, as in §1) … With a non-root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon as condition, a root-causeless resultant and non-resultant phenomenon arises, by root-cause condition … (in brief, as in §1) … With a non-root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon as condition, a root-causeless resultant and non-resultant phenomenon and a root-causeless resultant phenomenon arise, by root-cause condition … (in brief, as in §1) … With a non-root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon as condition, a root-causeless resultant and non-resultant phenomenon and a root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon arise, by root-cause condition … (in brief, as in §1) … With a non-root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon as condition, a root-causeless resultant and non-resultant phenomenon and a root-causeless resultant and non-resultant phenomenon arise, by root-cause condition … (in brief, as in §1) … With a non-root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon as condition, a root-causeless resultant and non-resultant phenomenon and a root-causeless resultant and non-resultant phenomenon and a root-causeless resultant phenomenon arise, by root-cause condition … (in brief, as in §1) … With a non-root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon as condition, a root-causeless resultant and non-resultant phenomenon and a root-causeless resultant and non-resultant phenomenon and a root-causeless non-resultant phenomenon arise,
